title: The first part of the life and raigne of King Henrie the IIII. Extending to the end of the first yeare of his raigne. Written by I.H.
author: Hayward, John, Sir, 1564?-1627.
publicationStmtPublisher: By [E. Allde and T. Judson for] Iohn Woolfe, and are to be solde at his shop in Popes head Alley, neere to the Exchange,
